title: Stationery, "M&Co: 50 West 17th St.", ca. 1980
creditline: Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.
description: The antique rosette-and-Greek-key design in shades of green forms a frame, anchored by four larger rosettes at the corners. M&CO in a bold calligraphic style is imprinted within the frame, centered at the top of the page; the address and other information are imprinted in a sans-serif style font on one line directly underneath.

tombstone.epitaph:
Stationery, "M&Co: 50 West 17th St.", ca. 1980.
ca. 1980. Offset lithography. Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.. 1993-151-382.
